body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Insurance. My name is Vincent Murphy, how may I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Barbara. For verification purposes, may I have your date of birth in the format day, month, year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two eight zero three, one two, nineteen sixty-seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Barbara. Can you also provide me with the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's nine eight two zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Barbara. Is there a specific reason for your call today or any particular concern you'd like to address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I received a notification about a security issue related to my car dealership and I'm feeling surprised about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Barbara. Let me look into this matter for you and provide you with the necessary assistance. Thank you for reaching out to us today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting XYZ Insurance, Barbara. Have a great day.
